import type { Assign } from '@ark-ui/vue'
import { Progress } from '@ark-ui/vue/progress'
import { progress } from 'styled-system/recipes'
import type { HTMLStyledProps } from 'styled-system/types'
import type { Component } from 'vue'
import { createStyleContext } from '~/lib/create-style-context'

const { withProvider, withContext } = createStyleContext(progress)

export type RootProviderProps = Component<typeof RootProvider>
export const RootProvider = withProvider<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Progress.RootProviderBaseProps>
>(Progress.RootProvider, 'root')

export type RootProps = Component<typeof Root>
export const Root = withProvider<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Progress.RootBaseProps>>(
  Progress.Root,
  'root',
)

export type CircleProps = Component<typeof Circle>
export const Circle = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'svg'>, Progress.CircleBaseProps>>(
  Progress.Circle,
  'circle',
)

export type CircleRangeProps = Component<typeof CircleRange>
export const CircleRange = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'circle'>, Progress.CircleRangeBaseProps>
>(Progress.CircleRange, 'circleRange')

export type CircleTrackProps = Component<typeof CircleTrack>
export const CircleTrack = withContext<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'circle'>, Progress.CircleTrackBaseProps>
>(Progress.CircleTrack, 'circleTrack')

export type LabelProps = Component<typeof Label>
export const Label = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'label'>, Progress.LabelBaseProps>>(
  Progress.Label,
  'label',
)

export type RangeProps = Component<typeof Range>
export const Range = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Progress.RangeBaseProps>>(
  Progress.Range,
  'range',
)

export type TrackProps = Component<typeof Track>
export const Track = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, Progress.TrackBaseProps>>(
  Progress.Track,
  'track',
)

export type ValueTextProps = Component<typeof ValueText>
export const ValueText = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'span'>, Progress.ValueTextBaseProps>>(
  Progress.ValueText,
  'valueText',
)

export type ViewProps = Component<typeof View>
export const View = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'span'>, Progress.ViewBaseProps>>(
  Progress.View,
  'view',
)

export {
  ProgressContext as Context,
  type ProgressContextProps as ContextProps,
} from '@ark-ui/vue/progress'
